product_name: Mountaineers Books I Promise Not To Suffer: A Fool For Love Hikes the Pacific Crest Trail
long_description: A heartfelt memoir of wilderness adventure,. Author: Gail D. Storey. Softcover; 224 pages. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2013. Appendices include details of unique ultralight gear used in the story and other how-to information.
short_description: A heartfelt memoir of wilderness adventure, I Promise Not to Suffer shares the journey of a middle-aged couple as they face the challenges and reap the rewards of the Pacific Crest Trail.
